Text: 10th Anniversary Edition? Man.... I can't believe that ten years already passed.... I feel old.
Sound and video are unsynchronised. video quality is good, but it's really unsynced. Download something better.

Audio and video are in sync, all you need is a decent player and codecs. 

Try the KM player + coreAVC or Media Player Classic + coreAVC.

This is definitely better than Secretmyth's...as far as darkness is concerned..
